EmailTemplate.name: First Responder Acceptance
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Congratulations! You have officially been accepted into the YETI First Responder Program. Now, let’s get you going.
PLEASE NOTE: Due to increased demand, a majority of items are currently out of stock. Please continue to check your account to see when items become available.
When you’re ready to place an order, follow these instructions:
Sign into your account by clicking here or copy and paste this link into your browser: https://yeti.com/customer/account/login/
Your log-in information will be sent in a separate email.
Things to keep in mind:
You must log into your account before placing an order online to receive the discount.
Once you’ve logged in, your discount of 15% will be reflected at the product level. Eligible items are marked ON SALE.
Discounted products are subject to availability.
Exchanges and returns must be processed directly with YETI and never through authorized dealers.
Shipping rates will apply.
All shipments to Alaska or Hawaii must be shipped 2nd Day Air, no ground service available, and may incur an additional shipping charge based on weight or insured value of the package.
Alaska and Hawaii are excluded from all Online Shipping specials.
Please do not share your account information with anyone. This program is meant for you alone. Misuse of this program is grounds for disqualification.
YETI reserves the right to cancel/suspend this program at any time without prior notice.
YETI reserves the right to change the discount and/or prices at any time without prior notice.
We are excited to have you as part of the YETI First Responder team! We hope you feel compelled to spread the word and encourage others to purchase their own YETI products at a local authorized YETI dealer.
Let us know if you have questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
